haiz.. dunno why but i juz feel lyk as though im missing sumthing lyk tht.. juz haf dat emptyness feelin inside me now...god noes why..mayb i noe the reason, mayb i dun.... juz feel sum emptyness inside myself and i dunno watz happening to me...cld it be.....nahz nvm.. 4get bout it.. Moron 6 - She WIll Be Murdered Kanasai queen of only fifty She had LOTSA troubles with herself He was never there to help her She always belonged to the garbage twuck I ran for miles and miles And FINALLY ended up at your door I've had you so little times but somehow I want less... I MIND spending everyday Out on your corner in the bloody rain Look for the girl with the broken head Ask her if she wants to F**kin hell get out And she will be hated She will be murdered!! Broke my window punched on my door I want to make you feel kannasai I know I tend to get soooooo secured It doesn't matter anymore It's not always rainbows and crows It's compromise that moves us along My heart is small and my door's always CLOSED You can't come anytime you want I do mind spending everyday Out on your corner in the bloody heavy rain Look for the girl with the broken arm Ask her if she wants to get out now And she will be hated She will be hated I know where you play Alone in your car Know all of the toys that make you who you are I know that goodbye means nothing at all Comes back and begs me to kick her every time she falls

haha.. the title damn nice rite? hahaha... orall..orallll .. oralllllllll hahaha..[dun tink sick XP] Well..yesterdae i had eng oral then i had lyk screwed it up BIG TIME.. got lyk 5 satisfactory, 5 need work lorx...wah kao.. [Note: At least i was beta then Kai Chung.. hahah XP who got 10 need work.. in short. all need work lahz.. *bleahZ* hahaha =X]ok tht was damn bad of me..!! Then when i finished my oral, i came down and saw kian long.. so went back together lorx..then i told him tht dom's gf, kristin was at the cafe wif u-noe-who.. hahaha i tink the person herself shld noe tht im referrin to her.. ^_^ and oso i wanted to ka jiao then lorx.. juz wanna sae.. "ORRRR....AWWWW happie waiting for ur bf's ^_^.." hahaha.. then kian long was lyk .. wanted to rate kristin...-.- dun get me wrong, i tink he juz wanna noe how krist looks lyk since he knows dom.. so i brought him there lorz..then once we reached the cafe, there was juz one puny, little problem.. we couldnt bring in our ice cream.. or oso noe as.. no outside food allow....*.*" so wat to do.. i juz ask kian long to hold my ice cream while i go in and collect back my cd from u-noe-hu...haha.. then when i came out i juz told kian long, "kian long sad sia.. so near yet so far.. u carn see krist liaoz.. hahahah" hehehe... Next when i came back, i went online at ard 8-9+.. and i was tokin bout how i screwed my oral up.. and how lester did for his oral.. then suddenly, lester's gf, u-noe-who said," Lester, i tot u were damn pro at oral?" then i was lyk.. ERRRRR..[yah.. i was tinkin sick at this point.. cannot arX XP >. Well todae, had annual parade rehearsal and all the altc's and bltc's hada leave at ard 11.30... at first suppose to leave at ard 11 lorx.. then dunno why.. stupid lim go sae leave at 11.30..aft the 2nd rehearsal.. and worse we hada march in the field.. where it was more lyk a swimming pool aft the rain..so we were walkin lyk.. yuck.. err.. no wait muz step there.. hahaa tryin all our best to avoid the mud.. then the 2 big boss or the contigent commander go stomp their feet into the ground and mud was flying everywhere.. then those standing in the frnt kanna lyk siao.. white uniform bcame brown....-.- heng heng i was standing in the 2nd row... haha!!! lucky me.. >. Then next was the POC[Passing Out Ceremony] Rehearsal.. wasnt realli fun.. juz boring.. and i was juz made the C.O.S .. and i was lyk blur blur made the C.O.S... haha onli hada command two times.. then dun hav liaoz!! haha yay!!! then got this dry run of the POC.. and then there was this section where they gave out special awards.. then bcoz dey dun wanna sae the real names of the awardees out, they juz pick ani person and try try lorx..then since i was the right marker...-.- i was generally the first guy to go up and try try....then the sir sae my name lyk 3 times....*.*" then i hada go stage 3 times.. see the officer on stage see till sianz.. shake his hand shake till sianz liaoz.. then everione started to laugh when i was called for the 2nd and 3rd time... haha everitime, "Yes, Sir!" haha 3 times..dunno why call me 3 times...haha could it be.. it means sumthing? dunno lahz.. my fren go sae wat tht i mite be gettin awards.. then another sae tht she has a feeling tht i mite be gettin 2 awards or so.. but i dun tink so lorx.. how can i get award???when i am lyk so quiet everitime wanz..then i bet wif kian long tht if i got ani awards, i would laugh till i die and treat him a can drink...nvm 80cents onli mahz.. hehe XP...*cheap cheap* ^_^... well dunno if i gettin ani awards or not.. mayb got more than 1.. then i would be damn damn damn damn damn damn happie!!! +D=D :-D gonna be so damn happie if tt happens to me.... juz hafta keep my fingers cross and pray hard.. ^_^ or juz let things take its course.........lets juz wait and see..... ORALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL ^_^

hai.. spend the whole afternoon fixing my blog.. and its up and running again ^_^.... wooohoo haha..Juz came back from car-washing duty.. well its basically juz the prefects washing cars to raise $$$ for the school in india..And we washed.. lets see.. Goh Poh Kenn's car...Nicole richard's car, Martina Chan.. oh and Sydney Tan's car..And among all these 4 cars.. there were 2 DAMN big(dua) cars..Family car summore.. then Qibin was busi there complainin bout how freakin big the car was and that why he hada wash cars.. Then all of us started laughing.. And he was the one who keep saeing, ok done lets wash the soap off the car now.. When the car was not properly washed yet....-.-" hahaha.. Everitime he first one to ask us to wash the soap off..haha.. and i dunno how come but i became the IC...-.- i juz go to the office.. and then Moses told me.. Hey Fu Weng, ur the IC for todae. so take their attendence down.. and i was lyk..errr? ^o).. o..k... haha so i juz blur blur bcame the IC.. The first car we washed was Goh Poh Kenn's car..When we first arrived.. everione complained tht her car was so damn freakin big.. but then everione still hafta wash mahz.. so bo bian..imagine 10+ ppl..washing one car...-.- and lucky when Goh Poh Kenn came out then she saw tht we had 10+ ppl.. she sae wat she would pay us double the price.. which is 20 bucks.. and everione went.. YEAH!!! hahaha. then in the end.. god noes how come there were soap in the places btween the 2 doors..and guess wat.. we couldnt wash it off...-.- so we juz left it alone.. *dum di dee.. dum dee di.. ^_^* haha no lahz.. the thing auto-dried lahz.. u tink we got so bad mehz? XP Next was Nicole Richards, then it was Martina Chan's... The best is yet to come.. coz when we were washing the 2nd car..Sydney Tan came out and told us..u all free rite? u all wash my car i pay 50 bucks..OMG lorz.. thtz lyk 5 times of wat a normal teacher wld pay!! ( which is 10 bucks.. for those who carn count =X hehez)... Then of coz everione agreed lahz!!! And guess wat.. i heard from my fren tht Sydney Tan has done this mani times..ard lyk 6 times..*.*""""...OMG... Sydney Tan is so rich!!!!! He's so damn rich to pay 50 bucks each time we wash his car!!! OMG OMG OMG.. >. Well i tink in almost all of the cars we washed.. we nv failed to hav sum soap stuck sumwhere on the car.. where we carn reach.. so wat we do? juz left it there.. and pray hard tht it will evaporate.. ASAP.. hahah.. if it doesnt.. *whistles..* hahaha err not my fault!!! dun come aft me!! But overall we all had fun washin the cars.. ^_^ Note: God noes why Goh Poh Kenn wanna take our names down.. mayb to kill us if her car wasnt washed properly.. =X die die!!! aaaaahhhhh!!!

Beauty queen of only eighteen She had some trouble with herself He was always there to help her She always belonged to someone else I drove for miles and miles And wound up at your door I've had you so many times but somehow I want more I don't mind spending everyday Out on your corner in the pouring rain Look for the girl with the broken smile Ask her if she wants to stay awhile And she will be loved She will be loved Tap on my window knock on my door I want to make you feel beautiful I know I tend to get so insecure It doesn't matter anymore It's not always rainbows and butterflies It's compromise that moves us along My heart is full and my door's always open You can come anytime you want I don't mind spending everyday Out on your corner in the pouring rain Look for the girl with the broken smile Ask her if she wants to stay awhile And she will be loved She will be loved I know where you hide Alone in your car Know all of the things that make you who you are I know that goodbye means nothing at all Comes back and begs me to catch her every time she falls

Life to me now seems meaningless..i m no longer the R & P 2nd ic.. and i dun tink im gonna get the Overall IC for the current sec 2s.. So tht would mean that whenever i go for training on saturdaes..i would juz be sitting there and doin nth much.. *haiz..* why why.. why...i dun wanna be in the same level as the scholars, and those who dun haf a post.. i wanna get a god damn post.. SJAB seems meaningless to me now. What can i do? and the R & P 2nd ic was taken by Zhi Wei. Who was suppose to be the PD 2nd ic.. But eugene wong decided tht PD ic should onli hav one and he was kicked out. Then the current R & P NCO's decided that he be the R & P 2nd ic.. Oh well... no post dudes.. no post.....=[ Juz came back from lot 1 coz i went there to see if got ani fones or not.. Bcoz....i dropped my fone todae in a pool o f water....*.*" So it carn work liaoz[*errrmzzzzz*...^_^].. no more 8250..then i juz hafta use my mum's 8250...Then went to lot 1 the starhub shop there and the fone stock there was pathetic.. so lil fones there.. then summore if i wanna get new fone now muz pay extra 100 bucks...so i juz hafta wait for 3 more mnths till i get a new foen and no more of my mum's 8250.. *yay!!!!*... So wif my mum's 8250.. i went to check for a casing coz my mum's 8250 is a light purple casing.. then its lyk so gay if i use it coz purple casing iz more for ladies then guys... So i found this shop. And i went to see see wif my sis.. Then i saw this velvet black casing for 8250 which cost 8 bucks.. So i went back and tell my dad.. And he said u using ur this fone for another 3 more mnths then getting new fone liao still wanna buy casing for wat. [at this point i juz kept quiet so its more lyk a silent protest..] *censored* lorz.. dun tell me i hafta go ard wif tht light purple coloured casing tht iz meant for ladies?? fu*k sia.. i juz bloodi hell hate my parents.. in the end i juz hafta sae nvm .. and dun buy the bloodi fu*k up casing for 8250..Then after my mum bought bread from Breadtalk.. we juz went off.. so i felt lyk nobodi fu*kin hell cares bout me.. even todae during training i felt isolated.. i dunno why.. i juz felt tht even if i die in frnt of my parents. i doubt they even fukin care......Juz feel tht life is totally meaningless to me at this point of time.. Then in the end wat i do? i hada fukin hell use my own money to buy the fuked up casing so tht i dun hafta go ard wif the fukin purple casing.. i even hada lie to my parents tht i was gonna look at sum game shop which of coz i din.. Then ONLI when i told my mum to keep the old 8250 did she remember bout the fuked up casing. i told her tht its was nvm [but of coz in my heart i was pissed..] and tht my dad sae not to buy the fuked casing..Then she said to go buy the casin.. but i haf alredae bloodi bought the thing wifout them knowing..and lucky my sis said tht she will help me go see tml and see if got ani cheaper or not which iz of coz false..That saved me sia lucky.. What do i live on this earth for? when im juz being isolated, not cared bout and no one bothers bout me.. even if i die in frnt of my parents i doubt they would even care bout me..i juz feel lyk i dun belong here..and i dunno why...Haiz.. Life realli is meaningless.. Note: sowwie bout the usage of vulgarities. I juz wanted to vent my anger out thtz all....=x

haiz.. this sux sia my dad expects me to do my hmk on a bloodi fri nite.. wat the hell sia.. ok even though im gonna visit my granny tml which is on a saturdae....Then i still have sundae to do wat... Fridae nite oso carn slack.. muz do hmk wanz.. wah lau i not sum nerd or sum person who likes studyin.. im juz lyk u. Who wld most probably if given a chance would do ur own hmk either on sat or on sun.. I mean who would wanna do their hmk on Fridae bsides.. those damn on guys.. But i noe tht im not a on guy...Carn even use the comp in peace. Everi now and then its either my mum or my dad would come in look look, and then go out. Wat i do? i juz look at them and they look at me and the computer then they go out.. watz their problem sia... its not as if im surfing wat porn sites lyk tht.. thn everitime i play till halfway my dad wld come in and sae, he wanz to use e net. And wat i do? i juz hafta disconnect the net and let him use.. even if im dling sumthing or even surfing the net.. And i doubt im gonna do my hmk on the Fridae nite lorz. And then my dad saes he is gonna ban me from comin into contact wif the com the next time if i keep on playin..wah lau ..I was lyk.. errr... watz ur prob...i carn even play on e fridae nite mehz??? den wat he expects me to do my hmk on a fridae or even wat do throughout the three daes and all i do is juz do hmk , do hmk and do hmk? =/.. iz tht wat my dad wans... i juz hate it when he forces me to do sumthing lyk to do my hmk on e bloodi fridae nite.. haiz.. realli wanna go to renaissance tml.. but too bad i hav sumthing on so cannot go.. then i wanna go for kindred spirit oso dunno if can or not.. i juz asked my mum juz now and she sae wat tht she carn confirm anithing yet.. haiz.. i realli realli wanna go....*sobZ sobZ* =[

Which i WILL NEVER EVER DO. I would not suck up to ani of the NCO's. If i dun get the post, then so be it.....wtf...

haiz..so bored sia todae..woke up at ard 11+ and found myself feelin gong gong.. duno why lahz..muz hav sleptfor too long liaoz. hehez..Next of coz i went to eat breakfast and watch tv at the same time..and breakfast was juz a Burger King burger. [so little sia!! >. Then went to do my hmk..so toot lorz..muz do hmk..haiz..stuck in this prison and oways have to do "work".....but lucky i did most of my hmk yesterdae..so onli left a few ques. And finally i finished then went for a haircut..And the barber din...realli cut tht well..and now my hair looks lyk toot lyk tht..haiz..guess i wld juz hafta wait till my hair grows back..and it beta be ASAP.. Then came back from hair cut liaoz..finally can hav time to slack..get to chat wif my frenz on msn..then tryin to find the songs that i wanted..These songs are from the Spiderman2 Soundtrack....And i pratically got the whole album..[dun ask me how i get it XP]. Then went to eat dinna.. I was dead hungri..[wait..when was i nv hungri? =/ heez] Gobbled the food down my mouth and eat as fast as i could and here i am finished eating and my stomach full typing this blog entry.... And juz now.My dad asked me to stop playin the com. Then i was tryin to sae i wasnt playin but tryin to make me blog but he still god damn continued to sae stop playin. And all the "words of wisdom" starts comin out askin me to do this do tht saeing exams are near shld go study and so on. and i juz kept quiet and let him toked then i juz walked off and came into the study room..to type this blog. yap this blog.. Haiz..is study tht revolves around me? Throuhgout my whole life?...Studyin, studyin..iz that wat im living for on this world? And nth else.. is asking me to study all my parents know and nth else.....i realli dunno....=[

Woke up at ard 7+. Gettin ready to go for training..And to PUMP the sec 2s down.. hehez ^_^ haha jokin lahz.. u tink i wat? sadist ahz..I not sadist ok!!!haha .. Went there and found out that i was the Overall In Charge of the current sec2s...so shiok sia..Coz i got to be in charge of the squad that i wanna take..^_^ [haha sec2s dun start suckin up now XP] And todae..during fall in, the R & P[Research And Publicity..] NCO from the laz time of 4 candidates...it increased to 7 ppl...And i was lyk.. errr? how come suddenly increased to so much? :| And everybody vied for the post of R & P. Then the NCO's started askin ques lyk..How much did u get for ur eng? Why u wanna take the post of R & P, and oso If u were chosen as the R & P 1st ic..who wld u wanna take as ur 2nd ic? All these were tough..as all of us there wanted to get the laz remaing post..Then when they called us out one by one to ask tht que bout who u wanna choose as ur 2nd ic...i found out tht Nigel chose me as his 2nd ic..And i chose him if i were to bcome the 2st ic [which is impossible!!! =X] And guess wat the NCO said to me.. Gay Partners..yap thtz wat he sae.. but im not gay of coz [DuH!!] In the end from 7, there were onli 3 ppl left..Me, Nigel and Ircahn..Then they chose Nigel as the 1st ic..And now he was being given the decision to choose me or Ircahn as the 2nd ic.. And Nigel went ard askin the Sec3 squad member..Who they would chose..and guess wat..I was chosen..and voted by the squad....-.- to be the 2nd ic.. Then i tink it was lyk ard 10+ rite.. We had our own free time, i heard Jeremy[one of the candidate for R & P] asking kian long a.k.a King Kong[or kianG long =X]that does Kian Long tink tht he[Jermey] shld take the R & P post or not.. and i was lyk sitting bside him then he told kian long to stop tokin...That made me feel bad lorz...lyk i haiz...dunno wat to sae oso..=[ Well but good thing was that i bcame the Overall IC for the Sec2 squad and in the morning when the sec2s knew i was their Overall In Charge..all wanted to suck up to me *.*".... Lets see who's inside....Bunni..[haha sumbodi shld remember this guy ^_^..]..Marcus..OhOH and err the CPM [Company Pervert Man] and mani other more....Then i have err.. The PT , First Aid and Footdrill IC under me!!..[WOOHOO] hehez..lets see.. i have the power to correct em..stop anithing for the sec2s...pump em down Then after parade..there was this AGI thingy..and sum of us..juz raise their hands when asked that they need 15 ppl..And it turned out tht we r goin to be in the colour's party....-.- which i tink is the flag bearer...Then everione went.. UHHH? oh well but i dun mind being the flag bearer.. Oh boi..oh boi!! carn wait to be confirm tht i will be the currrent Sec2 Overall IC..the squad which i wanna take e most..is under me now.. MUAHAHAHHA DIE PPL!! Note to ani sec2s who comes across this blog by wateva means: wanna suck up to me? try suckin up keke =X XP.....

well for once in sch i din not fall asleep during lessons!! [Even during my PMS Teacher's period....] so cool sia..and i was made ic for the dae in my prefect duty...-.-jeez...well wat to do we[the sec 3s] are gonna take over mahz.. so hafta bcome ic wanz.Then my sec 3 fren went lyk.. err which area am i takin? Even though i told him where he was supposed to do liaoz..he still kept askin me...-.- I wanted to bang my head against the wall. *bang!* And question myself..wat kinda ic am i? that when i assign duty i din assign or tell them properly..Well but luckily the canteen was clean and there wasnt ani litter around.. [*yay!!!*] hahaz..Still kinda pissed wif my bloodi maths teacher [read my previous entry...juz b4 this wan] and i din realli bother much or do much in her class. Most funni was during my form teacher's lesson [ Mrs. Gloria Cheng] when we were discussing about the common mistakes tht were made by the students during the English Oral... then we came to this word which is Lup Cheong [ it means dried sausage in Cantonese..] as we had other races in my class, sum of them dunno watz tht then my fren did sumthing that caused all of us to go :O:O:O:O and burst out in laffin lyk mad.[guess 309 ppl shld noe why.. ^_^]. Bcoz my fren's hands when up and down. Which reminds everybodi of...okok i wun sae the whole word here.. i wld juz sae.. Wank....-.- Even my teacher started to laff..[aiyoh...dirty Mrs. Cheng] and summore she was the first one who told my fren to not do tht action when he's saeing the word dried sausages.....-.- sick teacher sia.. =X hehe. Then she told us tht sumone frm 310 or 311 did sumthing lyk this oso in frnt of a teacher summore....-.- He went.." teacher, cannot todae i got oral..*hands go in and out in frnt of the mouth*...-.-] And according to my teacher, he did it wifout ani intention. And the male teacher's face started to turn red... WAHHAHAHHAHAAHAHHA i carn blieve it sia... =X haiz.. wat to sae bout my teacher..she's horny? Realli wat..the whole class din even tink to tht kinda "far" stage then she's the first one to "spot" it and asked my fren to stop doin tht action... *.*" Then after sch.. hada meet Sydney Tan, my prefect master.. he called for all the sec 3s and 2s to meet him after school..to discuss bout our project as to raise money for the poor sch in India(if im not wrong.... Xp.) haha sowwie lahz i wasnt realli sure bout the school...lolZ..but all i noe is tht we needa raise bout 1000bucks for tht sch so they to help them wif their financial problems..and guess wat we are doin?..As usual, its car wash...and i hafta go askin teachers on mondae as to who wanz their cars to be washed by... THE Prefects.. hehez.. guess its THEIR honour to hav us washing their cars XPXPXPXP =X and looks lyk we are gonna hav ard 14 ppl washing one car or mayb even more? who noes...well but its gd to sumtimes do sumthing that will benefit other's for the long run. Lyk now.. we r raising mony for the poor children who arent lyk us who gets to eat as full as us nor even get tht much allowance.. so its gd to noe tht there exists this kinda damn poor ppl ard..So we shld help them..dont u agree wif me?......=S haha am i speakin a language to profound for u ppl? hehez .. *bleahz* cool sia.. sumbodi went home wif sumbodi.. wah lau lester and you-noe-who.. why u 2 so lightbulb? XP hehez.. well for all u noe.. sparks mite soon be flying.. ;) hehez

Juz came back from AP Rehearsal onli..and im damn tired..so sianz, still needa study for test and do sum shit maths hmk given by my PMS teacher..When she at first wanted to let us pass up on mon then she refused and asked us to pass up tml..[damn her!] And worse of all i got scolded for nth..*wtf* sia. She called me and two other guys up suspecting they we all three copied each other's work. Both of them had the same mistake and she scolded them. Then she started to scold me and saeing who copied who. And upon checkin, i found no god damn mistakes in my bk!!! I din had the mistakes tht were being made by the other two ppl..And summore i had all ticks lorz.. then i said," where got mistake?" then she nv sae anithing. Wtf lorz.. and summore go write my name down.. TOOOT.. bloody PMS teacher =X At least the others got scolded bcoz they made a mistake...[and ronald's bk got tore by her] I got bloody scolded for nth lorz.. watz her problem sia..wanted to sae.. "go to hell lahz u" scolded me for nth...so damn pissed sia.. and she nv sae anithing.. juz kept quiet and i walked away.Freak sia.. Oh and during AP Rehearsal [eug jealous? ^_^] we hada march even if it was raining..even if the rain was getting heavier n heavier....we juz had to practice for AP [Annual Parade] so everybodi was wet..[dun tink sick...-.-] and worse of all we hada march on the field and there was puddle of mud everywhere!! so it was lyk everione's shoe's turned frm plain white to brown. Sum even turned totally ly black colour lyk tht bcoz of the water..And i went, nice shoe's u hav there then after ard 2+ hrs and marchin ard lyk nutz.. we were finally released..by this time, our shoes were dirty, shirts and pants wet..hair all wet..well but at least we had a nice, cool weather to march. So it was kinda cool [except bout the mud part...] Then came home and lester's gf.. asked me to look out of my study room window..aft bout 5 mins, the main characters appeared!!! It was lester and his gf walkin side by side and tryin to find where i was bcoz they asked me to wave to em...-.-" so i guess lester muz hav gone to erhem's house to do wateva..[note: wateva can mean mani things.. ^_^] And i smsed em saeing..."notti,notti!!" haha. God noes wat they were doin at her hse.. *eyes roll ard..* then i started to sms em.. and i asked you-noe-who whether she held hands wif lester.. and she..replied and i cld infered tht she did!! :O:O:O:O so they did hold hands while walkin to the bus stop [ orrrrrrr ORRRRR... awwwww soooooo shhhhhoooo sweeeet ^_^] ok thtz kinda bad..but oh well.. this is a private blog..unless it gets into the hands of my Physics teacher.. then ALL WILL B LOST.. so you, yesh you! the person who's reading now.. its btween u and me =P >. . oh well.. goin nutz and grining at the sight tht whenever lester comes to you-noe-who's hse i will oways[ ok lahz .. sumtimes ^_^] get to noe and see em. Then after sch had fall in..its to tell us bout tomorrow's AP( Annual Parade) rehearsal..guess im marchin as supporting contigent..as usual lyk i have been doing for the past two years..haiz..sianz..tml got AP rehearsal..till dunno god noes when..mayb even till 5+? nobodi noes..but well its cool to be marchin. And then the couple in frnt of me had to hold hands[ORRRRRRRRRRRR]....*.*" at this point i realli felt outcasted!! and i tink i heard one of the RGS gurls saeing tht wat that was damn paiseh..[note: one of em was chio =P=P=P =X >. Wanna noe the lyrics? here goes. Side,Side,Side Side,Front,Back Side,Front,Side,Back Side,Front,Back [say all these in 4 dif languages] and i actually cld sae in all 4 languages!! *cool* and those two gurls blame me for makin them addicted to it.. they sae wat everywhere they go, they will remember tht song..and it wasnt my fault!! *sobz sobz* Next i went to BPP to buy my uniform cover...and it freakin cost me 5 bucks for tht dumb cover...-.- i was broke.. oh and did i mention tht 2 couples were at the BPP busstop? ^_^ those 4 ppl were waiting for their bus to come while i go BPP to buy my stuff.. and i finished buyin liaoz.. their bus juz came...-.- so those 4 ppl went in pair by pair.. We were makin so much damn noises on the bus.. tokin bout mass..orgi..dat we "had" at west coast.. hahaha. it wasnt realli considered as a mass orgi, coz its juz all of us jumpin on sumthing tht looks lyk a wooden plank and wif a spring below it and tokin bout nic owning lester...-.- for all u noe, lester next would go "woof, woof" when nic saes, "come doggy" ^_^
